original_title: Arlette: En historie vi aldrig m√• glemme
overview: The Story of Danish/French holocaust-survivor, Arlette Andersen, told from her horrifying point of view. From being a normal teen in Paris to her imprisonment in the infamous concentration camp, Auschwitz, she gives the younger generations a look into, a not so distant past of true horror.
tagline: A Story We Shall Never Forget
title: Arlette
